name: Mediterranean Meatballs Power Bowl
description: Not your grandma’s salad! This power bowl is packed with lean protein and tasty veggies to power you through your day, with herbaceous flavours that will have you coming back for more. Fennel has an anise flavour (think black licorice!) with vitamins and minerals that support heart health and reduce inflammation. And don't let beets’ earthy flavour deter you—this ruby red superfood is high in fibre, potassium, and anti-inflammatory nutrients.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation:
1. In a large bowl, use a fork to combine ground turkey and seasoning. Form into 16 meatballs (about 2 tbsp each).
  2. Arrange in a single layer in Round Steamer or Multipurpose Steamer (it’s okay if the meatballs touch each other). Cover and microwave on high for 4 min or until cooked through.
  3. Thinly slice fennel and beet, and dice cucumber.
  4. Divide leafy greens, fennel, beet, and cucumber between four bowls. Top each bowl with four meatballs. Drizzle with dressing.
tips: Use 4-in-1 Mandoline fitted with 1.5 mm slicer plate to thinly slice fennel and beet.
